name: Rats, Bats, and Bones
description:
Rats, Bats, & Bones is a challenging tower defense game in which you play the role of a renowned engineer who must use wits and guile to defeat hordes of undead. Place traps including spikes, spears, cannons, bombs, and turrets, in the walls and floors. Be creative with barricades in order to shape the path of your enemies. Carefully select abilities as you battle your way through a story containing 30 hand-crafted levels. As you beat the invaders back, you will be rewarded with silver which can be used to unlock new traps, trap upgrades, and special player bonuses.Features
  • Play 30 hand-crafted levels with multiple difficulties
  • Earn silver to unlock new abilities as you play through the story
  • Deploy 20 clever traps in your own creative way
  • Each trap has its own unique upgrade to unlock
  • Choose between 14 powerful player bonuses
  • Battle against over 20 unique enemies
  • See how far you can last in "endless" mode
  • Killer synthwave soundtrack
